ul.li: Achieve and maintain LDL cholesterol below 70 mg/dL to reduce cardiovascular risk.

Patient will implement and maintain a diabetes self-management plan to prevent progression to type 2 diabetes, including dietary changes, increased physical activity, and regular blood glucose monitoring.

Patient will demonstrate understanding of recommended lifestyle changes to manage blood pressure, including dietary sodium reduction, regular physical activity, weight management, and medication adherence.
Achieve and maintain blood pressure below 130/80 mmHg as per current guidelines.
